explains: n. 赔偿金，补偿金；弥补，抵消；报酬，薪水
wordGroup: error compensation 误差补偿，平差
reactive power compensation 无功补偿
motion compensation 运动补偿；动态补偿
radius compensation 半径补偿；径差补偿
compensation package 赔偿计划；薪酬包
executive compensation 管理层薪资水平
compensation insurance 职工赔偿保险

sentences.en: The injured party got some compensation.
sentences.cn: 受害方得到了一些补偿。

sentences.en: They have a valid claim to compensation.
sentences.cn: 他们有要求赔偿的合法权利。

sentences.en: They lodged a compensation claim against the factory.
sentences.cn: 他们向工厂提出了赔偿要求。
